description: Get the list of deployments and filter with these options: service name, environment, build ID, commit ID, container image tag.

options.description: Filter by the build ID of the source repository
Filter by a commit ID from the source repository
Filter by the deployment ID of the source repository
Filter by a container image tag
Return only top N most recent deployments
Output the information one of the following: normal, wide, JSON
Watch the deployments for a live view
Display the table without separators between columns
